name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Operations Engineer with a robust background in **AWS**, **Terraform**, **Ansible**, and **Kubernetes**, leveraging 13+ years of experience in deploying and managing high-performance applications. Skilled in implementing **CI/CD** pipelines and Infrastructure as Code (IaC) practices using **GitLab CI**, **Helm**, and **Argo CD**. Proven ability to enhance system reliability through observability tools such as **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **CloudWatch**, while ensuring adherence to security best practices and incident response protocols.

Equipped with a strong foundation in both frontend and backend development, with expertise in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Node.js**, and experience with **FastAPI** and **Django**. Experienced in developing AI/ML-powered platforms with a focus on predictive analytics and automation and deploying cloud-native systems across various environments including **AWS** and **Azure**. Well-versed in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Adept in MLOps utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

Designed and executed security best practices across environments, including vulnerability assessments and compliance audits ensuring adherence to organizational policies.
